cards.name: Mutual Assured Feeding Doctrine
cards.tagline: If one dies, the other MUST fight. Science demands it.
cards.rule: If one of you dies, the other must take a fight within 20 seconds (gank, dive, TP reaction — anything).
cards.win: Win lane or force the enemy to burn 2+ TPs by minute 10.
cards.why: Pubs overcommit after a kill. You punish greed with immediate tempo.
cards.spice: Type “worth” after every kill you trade back.
cards.warning: Tilt hazard: ego inflation + revenge TPs. Breathe.

cards.name: No Brain, Only Buttons
cards.tagline: Strategy is illegal. Only cooldowns allowed.
cards.rule: You can only call cooldowns (e.g. “stun ready”, “ult 30”, “no spells”). No macro talk.
cards.win: Win one fight with clean spell layering (no overlapping stuns/ults).
cards.why: Stops overthinking and makes execution crisp.
cards.spice: Every time you win a fight, say “pure mechanics” in voice.
cards.warning: If you start drafting philosophy mid-game, you lose the card.

cards.name: The Shared Delusion
cards.tagline: Every smoke is forced. Confidence is the build.
cards.rule: After minute 10, every smoke you buy must be used within 90 seconds. No debate.
cards.win: Kill the enemy carry twice without feeding a streak.
cards.why: Momentum beats correctness in pubs. You keep the map unstable.
cards.spice: Before smoking: “They won’t expect this.” Even if it’s obvious.
cards.warning: If you smoke into 5 heroes twice, you must compliment their teamplay.

cards.name: Win Lane, Forget Game
cards.tagline: All resources into lane dominance. Then pretend you’re normal.
cards.rule: Spend aggressively for lane: extra regen, early stats, stick, boots. Play to crush lane.
cards.win: Take the enemy safelane/offlane tower by minute 10.
cards.why: Pubs mentally collapse when their lane is destroyed early.
cards.spice: If you take tower pre-10: do a synchronized voice “WOOOO”.
cards.warning: Don’t throw by diving tier-2 at minute 8. You’re not that guy.

cards.name: Support Main Character Syndrome
cards.tagline: The carry follows. The support calls. Democracy is cancelled.
cards.rule: Pos 5 makes the first 3 macro calls (smoke/tower/rosh). Carry must follow silently.
cards.win: Win one fight you started with a support-initiated call.
cards.why: Supports usually see the map better in pubs. This tests discipline.
cards.spice: Every successful call: carry types “my captain” once.
cards.warning: If it fails, do NOT argue. You signed the card.

cards.name: Ward Tax Evasion
cards.tagline: Wards are a social construct. Vision by violence.
cards.rule: No buying observers until minute 12. Use sentries only for dewarding or invis heroes.
cards.win: Win 2 skirmishes purely by reading rotations (sound/map sense).
cards.why: Forces you to learn enemy movement instead of relying on green dots.
cards.spice: Say “I see them with my third eye” before each move.
cards.warning: Unranked only. This can be grief in ranked if your team hates fun.
